column4: i need to reinstall windows for a new job on my laptop but i have ubuntu  how do i delete the grub and get everything where it needs to be for windows to be able to reinstall???
i need to reinstall windows for a new job on my laptop but i have ubuntu  how do i delete the grub and get everything where it needs to be for windows to be able to reinstall???
windows will rewrte the MBR when it installs.. other then that.. just delete the partitions you dont want. and boot iwnodes installer
